tns:projectTemplate.name: AS3 + Minimal Comps
tns:projectTemplate.description:
Included with this template is the Minimal Comps Library - v 0.9.5.
'MinimalComps are a set of minimal user interface components for use in ActionScript 3.0 based projects.'
For more info see the Minimal Comps homepage: http://www.minimalcomps.com/
